issue.title: [Java][Gandiva] Not able to find libgandiva_jni.so in gandiva jar
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13077](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13077). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Exception: "Exception in thread "main" libgandiva_jni.so was not found inside JAR."

Following is a screenshot of the gandiva jar

![image-2021-06-15-00-37-43-378.png](https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/13026821/image-2021-06-15-00-37-43-378.png)

Came access this issue while running Gandiva expression evaluator(Java) sample code.
